detectors.description:
Reentrancy in UniDStackingLock.claim() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniDStackingLock.sol#80-89):
	External calls:
	- contractBalance = UniD(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniDStackingLock.sol#82)
	- require(bool,string)(UniD(tokenAddress).transfer(owner,amountToSend),Could not transfer Tokens.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniDStackingLock.sol#87)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastClaimedTime = now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniDStackingLock.sol#88)
